    • Method Detail

      • registerRequest

        public void registerRequest(int userid,
                            java.lang.String fname,
                            java.lang.String lname,
                            char[] pass,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String cnumber,
                            int toc,
                            int atype,
                            int smodel)
        make new Register Request and send it to the server.
        Parameters:
        userid - - the id number of the user
        fname - - first name of user
        lname - -last name of user
        pass - - password
        email - - email
        cnumber - - credit card number
        toc - - type of customer(private or company)
        atype - - access type (one station or more)
        smodel - - sale model (monthly,etc)

      • verifyDetails

        public void verifyDetails(java.lang.String userid,
                          java.lang.String fname,
                          java.lang.String lname,
                          char[] pass,
                          char[] repass,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String cnumber,
                          int toc,
                          int atype,
                          int smodel)
        verify all input textfields values and if all ok send register request to the server.
        Parameters:
        userid - - userid value
        fname - - first name value
        lname - - last name value
        pass - - password value
        repass - - retype password value
        email - - email value
        cnumber - - credit card value
        toc - - type of customer (0- for private,1-for company)
        atype - - access type value (0-Unique station, 1- 1 or more stations)
        smodel - - sale model value
